articles.description: The fashion company will merge with a SPAC, giving it cash to add to its empire.
articles.content: Such takeovers have soared in recent years, with rivals across the ocean taking on similar empire-building ambitions. Capri Holdings, formerly known as Michael Kors Holdings, acquired the Italian fas… [+1368 chars]

articles.author: Brittany De Lea
articles.title: Biden poses with ice cream cone on 'national ice cream day' - Fox News
articles.description: President Biden on Sunday celebrated national ice cream day by posting an image of himself grabbing a large cone and posing for a selfie.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden on Sunday celebrated national ice cream day by posting an image of himself grabbing a large cone and posing for a selfie.
